item.title: Spring Boot Scheduling With Annotation
item.description: Introduction Spring Boot provides annotation support for task scheduling. It is easy way to develop and run a Task scheduler without using any xml and bean configurations Simply add the annotation @Scheduled on the task scheduler method with required interval time. In this example, we will see how to use Spring @Scheduledannotation to schedule a task. Enable scheduling annotations To enable support for @Scheduled annotation add @EnableScheduling to one of your @Configuration classes:
